Description: Terra Sigillata wheel-made pottery sherd from a dish with a fine glossy red slip. Fine yellow pottery fabric.
Curator's comments: Imperial Roman red slip fine tableware sherd of Eastern Terra Sigillata A ware from Syria, dish form dated c. 10BC-40AD (Hayes 1985, form Atlal 35). Copies Italian Terra Sigillata ware form ITS 18.2.2 (Ettlinger et al. 1990). Hayes, J. W. 1985. Sigillate Orientali. In Encicliopedia dell 'arte antica, atlate della forme ceramica. II ceramica fine Romana nel bacio Mediterraneo (Tarlo ellenism eprimo imperio), pp. 1-96. Rome.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IF.062) (Phase 3)
